subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees scored 968 runs last season, their most in 70 years, and brought back every significant member of the team’s offense which is what makes the lineup’s sluggish start so peculiar.
snippet: The Yankees scored 968 runs last season, their most in 70 years, and brought back every significant member of the team’s offense which is what makes the lineup’s sluggish start so peculiar.
